content: Congrats to all the Fermyon folks on the Akamai acquisition!! https://www.akamai.com/newsroom/press-release/akamai-announces-acquisition-of-function-as-a-service-company-fermyon
Thank you so much Leslie! :heart: Really very much appreciated!
That's smart money. So congratulations to Akamai, too, on a very sensible acquisition. :stuck_out_tongue:
(Which is meant as a huge compliment to the Fermyon folks, in case that wasn't clear!)
